title: Hezekiah’s Passover Celebration
summary: Hezekiah invites all Israel and Judah to celebrate Passover in Jerusalem. Many respond and come, even those from the northern tribes. The celebration is joyful and heartfelt, and God blesses the people despite some imperfections in ritual observance.

faq.question: Why was this Passover special?
faq.answer: It united people from both Israel and Judah in worship after years of neglect.

faq.question: What was God’s response to the people's worship?
faq.answer: He heard Hezekiah’s prayer and healed the people, blessing their sincere return to Him.
